name: Alignment City
description:
This is a First Person Speedrun where you step on each building as fast as you can.  WASD to move and Space to jump.  Shift toggles running on or off (so WASD then moves you faster).

To Quit:

Cmd-Q on Mac

Alt-F4 on Windows

Possible Future Updates (if requested in comments):

  • Best Times List (like a high score list)

P.S. I dare you to beat my fastest time!  (my fastest times are in the 'you won' screenshots at the top right)

Update: I got a better time (also in screenshots) about 331seconds.  My previous best was 387
